properties.title: SchemaCrawler Site Report - Maven Plug-in Example
properties.author: Sualeh Fatehi

section.name: SchemaCrawler Site Report - Maven Plug-in Example

subsection.name: Description
subsection.p:
The
SchemaCrawler Maven Plugin
is in a separate project. It can generate a SchemaCrawler report as part of your Maven-generated website.
